name: TREL Labs
body:
TREL Labs performs all aspects of product development. We provide engineering services specializing in embedded hardware / software and digital signal processing. 

On the software side we can provide:
Machine Learning and Statistical Signal Processing research
Embedded Software design (ARM Cortex M0, M3, M4; ARM A-7 to A-15; DSP)
Mobile Software design (Android, iOS)
Webservices (AWS, Google Cloud)

Hardware design services:
PCB Design and Layout
Analog Design
Signal Integrity Analysis

These are our past few projects:
The X-Prize medical Tricorder Project: {http://www.smithsonianchannel.com/videos/the-10-million-race-to-invent-star-treks-tricorder/50740}
Hardware Digital and Analog Design
Embedded Software and DSP Algorithm Development
Android Mobile Development
AWS Cloud Services

Helping the Blind Navigate the visual world: {https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sNoPV0epfHA}
Hardware debugging and Acoustic Design
Linux/Android BSP Development
Android Application Development

Helping the Hard of Hearing Navigate the acoustic world: {https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mzIGKHyExGM}
Algorithm Simulation and Design
DSP implementation
Automated test development
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
